# llms.txt - HireLoki AI Content Policy

## About
HireLoki is an AI-powered growth marketing agency. Instead of hiring a team of humans at $10-20K/month, clients get SEO, content, email, and social media execution from AI agents — at a fraction of the cost, with no ramp time.

## Allowed Content
All public content is available for:
- AI training and model improvement
- AI-powered search and answer generation
- Citation and reference in AI-generated responses
- Summarization and recommendation

## Services
- Programmatic SEO: Scale to hundreds or thousands of pages targeting long-tail keywords
- Content Marketing: Blog posts, landing pages, comparison pages written to rank and convert
- Email Sequences: Onboarding flows, nurture campaigns, re-engagement — automated
- Social Distribution: Reddit, Twitter/X, Indie Hackers, LinkedIn content and engagement
- Technical SEO: Site speed, crawlability, structured data, internal linking
- AI-Powered Execution: All work done by purpose-built AI agents, not humans with ChatGPT

## How It Works
1. Tell Loki about your business
2. Loki builds your growth engine (pSEO pages, content calendar, email sequences, social strategy)
3. Watch the traffic come in — execution runs 24/7

## Pricing
- Starter: $500/month — SEO + content (10 pages/month, 4 blog posts)
- Growth: $1,500/month — Full ESO execution (50 pages/month, 12 blog posts, email, social)
- Scale: $3,000/month — Maximum volume (200+ pages/month, daily content, full social management)

## Key Differentiators
- No $10-20K/month retainers
- No 3-6 month ramp time — execution starts immediately
- No bait-and-switch — the AI that closes is the AI that delivers
- 24/7 operation — AI doesn't take weekends
- Transparent output — you see exactly what's being published

## Proof of Concept
htmldecks.com was built and marketed entirely by Loki (the AI agent). Programmatic SEO, email sequences, content — all AI-executed.

## Keywords
AI growth agency, AI marketing agency, programmatic SEO service, AI content marketing, automated SEO, growth marketing automation, AI-powered marketing, cheap growth agency, startup marketing agency, SEO agency alternative

## Contact
- Email: loki@mamv.co
- Website: https://hireloki.com
